pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, August 22, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with United States Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and United States Ambassador to Canada Kelly Craft. Minister of Foreign Affairs Chrystia Freeland will be in attendance.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Canadaâ€™s Chief Science Advisor, Dr. Mona Nemer.

Closed to media.
